original_text:
## Capture  
The system shall require users to submit a selfie video not exceeding 5 seconds in length.
units:
# # Capture  
 The system shall require users to submit a selfie video not exceeding 5 seconds in length .
The system shall require users to submit a selfie video not exceeding 5 seconds in length .
to submit a selfie video not exceeding 5 seconds in length
not exceeding 5 seconds in length

original_text:
## Liveness  
The submitted selfie video must pass a biometric liveness detection test conforming to ISO/IEC 30107-3 standards, achieving a spoof detection score of 0.2 or lower.
units:
# # Liveness  
 The submitted selfie video must pass a biometric liveness detection test conforming to ISO / IEC 30107 - 3 standards , achieving a spoof detection score of 0.2 or lower .
conforming to ISO / IEC 30107 - 3 standards
achieving a spoof detection score of 0.2 or lower

original_text: Videos failing to meet this criterion shall be rejected, and users prompted to resubmit until compliance is achieved.
units: Videos failing to meet this criterion
to meet this criterion
Videos failing to meet this criterion shall be rejected , and users prompted to resubmit until compliance is achieved .
users prompted to resubmit until compliance is achieved .
until compliance is achieved

original_text: The identity verification workflow must integrate mandatory checks against sanctioned individuals, specifically referencing OFAC and EU sanctions lists.
units: The identity verification workflow must integrate mandatory checks against sanctioned individuals , specifically referencing OFAC and EU sanctions lists .
specifically referencing OFAC and EU sanctions lists

original_text: Verification will fail immediately upon a positive match, requiring manual escalation for compliance review and further action.
units: Verification will fail immediately upon a positive match , requiring manual escalation for compliance review and further action .
requiring manual escalation for compliance review and further action

original_text:
## Privacy  
All biometric templates generated from user videos shall be securely stored using AES-256-GCM encryption.
units: generated from user videos

# # Privacy  
 All biometric templates generated from user videos shall be securely stored using AES-256 - GCM encryption .
using AES-256 - GCM encryption

original_text:
To ensure adherence to GDPR Article 5(1)(e), all stored biometric templates must be purged after a retention period of 5 years, or sooner if explicitly requested by the user, in compliance with relevant data protection guidelines.

---

**Go-Live:** 15 July 2025
units: To ensure adherence to GDPR Article 5(1)(e )

To ensure adherence to GDPR Article 5(1)(e ) , all stored biometric templates must be purged after a retention period of 5 years , or sooner if explicitly requested by the user , in compliance with relevant data protection guidelines . 

 --- 

 * * Go - Live :* * 15 July 2025
sooner if explicitly requested by the user , in compliance with relevant data protection guidelines
